summary: Didnt like the previous Wedding Dress colour so i decided it would be better to change it to a more common colour incase others want it aswell
descriptionHtml:
Didnt like the previous Wedding Dress colour so i decided it would be better to change it to a more common colour incase others want it aswell.

Console Commands:
Player.Additem xxxxxxxx 1

Wedding Dress: 	00088956
Wedding Wreath:	0008895a
Wedding Sandals:	00088958

Installation
Extract into the Data folder in your steam directory.

Steam Directory -> steamapps -> common -> skyrim -> Data

Uninstall
Just Delete the folder from the data folder it was saved in.

Tutorial on how to make custom textures yourself
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GSXPxRD1cN0
author: o0o Recon o0o
